name: Cardening
description:
Hello fellow Garden Gnomes!

Welcome to our card-based game Cardening.

Your cards symbolize plants, animals and garden tools that you can play to create your garden.

Reading the tutorial below will help you learn the rules. When you successfully grow your plants, you get coins as a reward. You can use these to buy more garden equipment in the store.

The goal of the game is to successfully complete 9 levels.

We hope that you like our game. If so, please do not forget to leave a rating and a comment. We will return the favor.

And now - Happy Cardening!

Tutorial

We were planning an in-game tutorial, but ran out of time. I am adding the tutorial tiles here, and will probably write some more explanations the coming days - as these tiles missing the context. If you have questions, don't hold back and ask us in the comments.

Controls How to play
